enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces the effects of fire damage. Also reduces the burn time when set on fire.
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces fall damage and ender pearl teleportation damage.
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces damage from explosions and explosion knockback.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces damage from projectiles such as arrows and fire balls.
enchantment.minecraft.respiration.desc: Allows the user to breathe longer underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Causes damage to enemies when they attack you.
enchantment.minecraft.sharpness.desc: Increases the damage of the item.
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: Increases damage against undead mobs such as Zombies and Skeletons.
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increases damage against arthropods such as Spiders and Silverfish.
enchantment.minecraft.knockback.desc: Increases the knockback strength of the weapon.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc: Causes additional fire damage when used to attack a mob.
enchantment.minecraft.looting.desc: Mobs will drop more loot when killed.
enchantment.minecraft.efficiency.desc: Increases mining speed of the tool.
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Allows fragile blocks such as glass to be collected.
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Causes the tool to lose durability at a slower rate.
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Some blocks like coal and diamond ore may drop additional items.
enchantment.minecraft.power.desc: Increases the damage of arrows fired from the bow.
enchantment.minecraft.punch.desc: Increases the knockback strength of arrows fired by the bow.
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Arrows fired from the bow will deal additional fire damage.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Allows the bow to fire normal arrows for free. You must have at least one arrow for this to work.
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases the chance of getting good loot while fishing.
enchantment.minecraft.lure.desc: Decreases the amount of time it takes for a fish to bite the hook.
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Water under the user will freeze into frosted ice.
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: Repairs the durability of armor and tools with XP.
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: Prevents the cursed item from being removed from an armor slot.
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Destroys the cursed item if you die with it in your inventory.
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping.desc: Increases the damage of sweeping attacks.
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: Allows the trident to automatically return after being thrown.
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Using the trident while in rain or water will launch the user forward.
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Allows the trident to summon lightning bolts during thunderstorms.
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: Fires additional arrows in similar directions.
enchantment.minecraft.quick_charge.desc: Increases the reload speed of crossbows.
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Allows projectiles to pierce through mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Increases movement speed on soul blocks.
enchdesc.activate.message: Hold shift to view enchantment descriptions.
enchdesc.jei.compatible_items.title: Compatible Items
enchantment.gofish.deepfry.desc: Reeling in certain fish will cook them.
enchantment.shieldsplus.reinforced.desc: Increases amount of damage blocked by shields.
enchantment.shieldsplus.ablaze.desc: Sets attackers and projectiles on fire.
enchantment.shieldsplus.lightweight.desc: Allows the user to move faster when blocking.
enchantment.shieldsplus.shield_bash.desc: Gives the shield a bash attack.
enchantment.shieldsplus.perfect_parry.de: Blocking at the same time as taking damage completely negates the damage and stuns the attacker.
enchantment.shieldsplus.celestial_guardi: Getting killed while blocking will give an absorption effect and keep you alive.
enchantment.grapplemod.wallrunenchantmen: Allows the user to run on walls.
enchantment.grapplemod.doublejumpenchant: Allows the user to jump twice.
enchantment.grapplemod.slidingenchantmen: Allows the user to slide using built up momentum.
enchantment.hunterillager.bounce.desc: Increases how much boomerangs will bounce off walls.
enchantment.betterarcheology.penetrating: Some damage will bypass protection enchantments.
enchantment.betterarcheology.seas_bounty: Allows you to catch more types of treasure.
enchantment.betterarcheology.soaring_win: Gives the elytra a boost when taking off.
enchantment.betterarcheology.tunneling.d: Mines the block below the target block as well.
enchantment.deeperdarker.catalysis.desc: Killing mobs will spread sculk nearby.
enchantment.deeperdarker.sculk_smite.des: Increases damage to sculk based mobs.
enchantment.endlessbiomes.vwooping.desc: Enemies that attack you may be teleported away.
enchantment.endlessbiomes.shared_pain: When a mob is killed any excess damage will be dealt to nearby mobs.
enchantment.stalwart_dungeons.thunder_st: Gives hammers the ability to summon lightning.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.thunder: Attacks strike the target with lightning.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.deflect: Arrows may deflect back at the shooter.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.guardin: Defeating enemies boosts your defence temporarily.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.leechin: Defeating enemies will heal the user.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.rush.de: Temporarily increases speed after the user is hurt.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.cowardi: Attacks do more damage when the users health is full.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.illager: Attacks do more damage against illagers.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.pain_cy: Attacks hurt the user. Every fifth attack deals massive damage.
Attacks deal extra damage to enemies that are not looking at you.
enchantment.dungeonsenchantments.recycle: Being hit by projectiles sometimes produces arrows.
enchantment.create_sa.gravity_gun.desc: Allows the Block Picker to move and throw entities.
enchantment.create_sa.impact.desc: Allows the Grapplin Whisk to do a small burst of AOE damage.
enchantment.create_sa.digging.desc: Allows the drill to dig a bigger hole.
enchantment.create_sa.hellfire.desc: Increases the damage of the flamethrower and place fire.
enchantment.improved_exp.detection.desc: Attacks will make the target glow.
enchantment.improved_exp.autosmelt.desc: Breaking a block will smelt it instead.
enchantment.improved_exp.pain_relief.des: Holding shift will use EXP to regenerate health.
enchantment.improved_exp.coldblooded.des: The user takes damage in warm biomes.
enchantment.improved_exp.flammable.desc: Damages the wearer in direct sunlight.
Grants the wearer buffs in different dimensions.
enchantment.improved_exp.in_all_seriousn: Increases the wearers speed when their health is low.
enchantment.improved_exp.random_teleport: Teleports the user in a random direction.
enchantment.improved_exp.suspicious_look: Mobs will stare at the wearer.
enchantment.improved_exp.resistance.desc: Gives the wearer the resistance buff.
enchantment.improved_exp.fear_of_depth.d: Damages the wearer while deep below water.
enchantment.improved_exp.water_breathing: Allows the wearer to breath under water.
enchantment.improved_exp.bakingpowder.de: Allows the hoe to till multiple blocks at once.
enchantment.improved_exp.machine_gun.des: Reduces charge time of the bow.
enchantment.improved_exp.passage.desc: The user will fly towards what they look at.
enchantment.improved_exp.preview.desc: The users camera rotates to the right.
enchantment.improved_exp.evasion.desc: Allows the wearer to avoid damage.
enchantment.improved_exp.explosive.desc: When the user is low on health they will explode.
enchantment.improved_exp.night_vision.de: Allows the wearer to see in the dark.
enchantment.improved_exp.poisonous_water: The wearer is poisoned while in water.
enchantment.improved_exp.harm.desc: Removes all buffs from the wearer.
enchantment.improved_exp.pinger.desc: Warns the user when durability is low.
enchantment.improved_exp.warmblooded.des: Damages the wearer in cold biomes.
enchantment.improved_exp.night.desc: The wearer takes damage if they can not see the sky.
enchantment.improved_exp.return_from_voi: Teleports the wearer back to the surface if they fall into the void.
The wearer is healed while in water.
enchantment.improved_exp.strength.desc: Increases the attack damage of the wearer.
enchantment.improved_exp.invulnerability: The wearer does not take damage.
enchantment.improved_exp.true_shot.desc: Arrows are fired with more power.
enchantment.improved_exp.quick_kill.desc: Attacks have a chance to immediately kill the target
enchantment.improved_exp.weakness.desc: The wearer will take more damage than normal.
enchantment.improved_exp.fear_of_dark.de: The wearer takes damage in the dark.
enchantment.improved_exp.naturalfertiliz: Using the hoe has a chance to create bonemeal.
enchantment.improved_exp.professional_ri: The wearer can ride any mob.
enchantment.improved_exp.collector.desc: Killing a mob may drop a spawn egg of that mob.
enchantment.improved_exp.planeswalker.de: Allows the wearer to change dimensions using keybinds.
enchantment.improved_exp.golden_fever.de: Blocks have a chance to drop gold nuggets.
enchantment.improved_exp.gravity.desc: Right clicking a block will pull nearby entities in.
enchantment.improved_exp.blindness.desc: Reduces the vision of the wearer.
enchantment.improved_exp.telekinesis.des: Looking at an entity will pull them towards you.
enchantment.improved_exp.rebound.desc: Pressing the R key will make the user bounce backwards.
enchantment.improved_exp.constant_survei: The wearer is forced to look at the nearest mob.
enchantment.improved_exp.fire_resistance: The wearer is immune to fire damage.
enchantment.improved_exp.spurt.desc: Pressing the R key will thrust the player in the direction they are looking.
enchantment.improved_exp.magnet.desc: Block drops are pulled towards the user.
enchantment.improved_exp.easy_movement.d: Increases movement speed on certain blocks.
enchantment.improved_exp.treatment.desc: Removes negative effects from the wearer.
enchantment.improved_exp.hungry.desc: The wearer constantly loses hunger and saturation points.
enchantment.improved_exp.jumper.desc: Allows the wearer to jump while in the air.
enchantment.improved_exp.oxidation.desc: Attacks deal more damage to the targets armor.
enchantment.improved_exp.bury.desc: Attacking an entity will push them into the ground.
enchantment.improved_exp.recovery.desc: The user is healed when they attack others.
enchantment.improved_exp.fertilizing.des: Pressing the Z key will bonemeal nearby blocks.
The wearer moves faster in water.
enchantment.improved_exp.lavawalker.desc: Lava blocks nearby will freeze into obsidian.
enchantment.improved_exp.absorption.desc: Gives the wearer the absorption effect.
enchantment.improved_exp.ore_detector.de: Using the right mouse button will tell the user about nearby ores.
enchantment.improved_exp.werewolf.desc: Grants the wearer buffs based on the current moon phase.
The wearer will take damage if they are too high.
enchantment.butcher.butcherenchantment.d: Killing eligible mobs drops their corpse.
enchantment.blockswapper.excavating.desc: Allows replacing of blocks with air.
enchantment.cardiac.lifesteal.desc: Killing mobs drops more healing orbs.
